    | text      = I love that this is key footage for the film.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:13.719
    | text      = Also I want to help this guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:14.719
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:15.719
    | text      = Kind of giving away what your motivations are.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:16.720
    | text      = I really need to get this footage and as a completely altruistic gesture, I am going
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:22.720
    | text      = to get his Winnebago out, pay for one month of insurance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:26.420
    | text      = When he will have this happen again in a month.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:28.079
    | text      = And then two months later he will be back in the impound lot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:30.680
    | text      = Most likely, but that's not key footage.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:33.000
    | text      = No, no, no, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:35.159
    | text      = So yeah, we got a situation here where Alex is trying to be very manipulative and exploitative
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:40.680
    | text      = and this next clip I think should give you a sense of what's going on here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:46.079
    | text      = Alex has every reason to believe that this guy is white.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:50.460
    | text      = Those cops had no soul.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:51.720
    | text      = They should have just said, buddy, get insurance, get this off the road.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:55.760
    | text      = And here's the nexus point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:56.760
    | text      = I've had sheriffs and police chief on us, but all over the news, illegal aliens when
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:00.520
    | text      = they're caught 10, 15 to a van or Winnebago, the judges just release them so police don't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:05.520
    | text      = arrest them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:06.520
    | text      = I had an employee with an expired driver's license.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:09.079
    | text      = One day I pull up to the office, there's two police cars and cherries.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:12.560
    | text      = I pull up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:13.560
    | text      = I know to approach him from a distance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:15.520
    | text      = I walk up, the police kind of charge up to me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:17.960
    | text      = What do you want?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:18.960
    | text      = And they said, Oh, it's Alex Jones.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:19.960
    | text      = They said, Hey, Alex, like your show, blah, blah, blah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:23.279
    | text      = Video guys.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:24.279
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:25.279
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:26.279
    | text      = But I mean, to make a long story short, I said, you wouldn't be arresting him right
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:30.920
    | text      = now if he was illegal alien.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:31.920
    | text      = They said, no, the judges just let them go.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:34.000
    | text      = We're told not to.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:35.000
    | text      = So again, an American citizen gets no leeway instead of just saying, you better pull that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:39.939
    | text      = off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:40.939
    | text      = If I see this again, I'll give you a ticket.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:43.279
    | text      = Instead of giving him a ticket for not having the insurance, they stole his Winnebago.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:49.079
    | text      = So you see the dichotomy he's presenting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:52.000
    | text      = It's very similar to the dichotomy he was presenting earlier about the idea of these
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:56.600
    | text      = people in the tent city are nice and they're good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:59.560
    | text      = They're just trying to get money together to buy a home.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:02.119
    | text      = And Arnold Schwarzenegger is going to force them in with the other bad homeless people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:06.659
    | text      = who are drug addicts and crazy and all this stuff you see here, this guy got his Winnebago
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:11.279
    | text      = taken and Alex is certain that it's because he's a good citizen, not an illegal alien.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:16.319
    | text      = He's trying to create these divisions in category.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:20.079
    | text      = Now here's where this is interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:22.720
    | text      = Here we find ourselves at the end of March 2009 and Alex is going whole hog on this narrative
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:27.279
    | text      = about Arnold Schwarzenegger forcing homeless people into a county fairground, which according
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:31.520
    | text      = to Alex is the first run of putting people into FEMA camps.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:34.520
    | text      = It's easy to see how we'd make this connection, but it's really important to take a moment
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:37.720
    | text      = and look at the reality of the situation to see how he's lying about a couple things and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:42.159
    | text      = he's actually being tricked into supporting a couple others.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:46.439
    | text      = This all started back at the beginning of March when Oprah sent reporter Lisa Ling to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:50.640
    | text      = Sacramento to cover the homeless tent city that had popped up there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:54.560
    | text      = The reporting was incredibly flawed and based on a fundamentally incorrect premise, namely
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:59.319
    | text      = that the people living in the tent city were newly homeless.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:02.479
    | text      = The reason for misreporting this is easy enough to see.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:05.439
    | text      = It's a catchy hook for a story and Oprah called them the, quote, new face of homelessness,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:09.800
    | text      = the noble working poor who'd lost it all in the recession.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:13.000
    | text      = The problem is that this wasn't even close to true for the vast majority of the people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:16.380
    | text      = living in that tent city.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:18.279
    | text      = According to the Bay Area News Group, quote, with foreclosure rates in the Sacramento region
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:22.300
    | text      = among the highest in the nation, the ragtag camp has been depicted as a symbol of the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:26.079
    | text      = economic meltdown, people who'd lost their homes and were suddenly pitching tents along
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:30.039
    | text      = a riverbed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:31.220
    | text      = The truth is somewhat less dramatic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:33.140
    | text      = Although a sliver of the roughly 200 tent city residents are recently middle class people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:37.399
    | text      = who lost their homes, the overwhelming majority, 80 to 90 percent by several estimates, have
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:42.439
    | text      = been homeless for years, even decades.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:46.079
    | text      = A report in Reuters was even more severe saying, quote, a closer examination of the site, including
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:50.800
    | text      = interviews with camp residents and police officers who patrol the area, turned up little
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:54.640
    | text      = if any evidence that true recession refugees were living among the chronically homeless
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:00.000
    | text      = there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:01.000
    | text      = 55-year-old tent city resident John Kranitz commented on the influx of reporters covering
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:05.680
    | text      = the tent city after it was featured on Oprah, saying, quote, they don't want to talk to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:09.960
    | text      = me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:10.960
    | text      = They're searching for people who just lost their homes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:12.720
    | text      = It's kind of tough to lose a home when you've never owned one.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:15.640
    | text      = Sorry, most of the people here have been homeless for a long time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:19.479
    | text      = Oprah's report included a bogus statistic that 1,200 people were living in tent cities,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:23.920
    | text      = when in reality that was the number of homeless total in Sacramento, and the number at the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:28.600
    | text      = tent city was between one and 200.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:31.119
    | text      = So yeah, I was going to say there's no way that there could be that many people in one
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:34.579
    | text      = tent city.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:35.840
    | text      = It would it would eventually be its own city.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:38.399
    | text      = So one in 200 people, Alex has had Rob do saying that it's over 300 tents, that would
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:42.880
    | text      = be two to three tents per person.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:45.119
    | text      = That's nonsensical.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:46.279
    | text      = They're over inflating this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:48.239
    | text      = Joan Burke, the advocacy director for Loaves and Fishes, commented on the situation, quote,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:53.039
    | text      = the media are trying to capture a very complex situation in a soundbite.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:56.960
    | text      = We've had homelessness in this country for decades.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:59.319
    | text      = Each person has their own circumstances.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:01.659
    | text      = You have to tease that out if you're going to address the problem.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:05.520
    | text      = Why do we care so much for people who suffer for a short time versus those who suffer for
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:09.800
    | text      = a long time?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:11.079
    | text      = What's that about?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:12.520
    | text      = The media saw an easy human interest story here, and even if their intention was to help
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:16.479
    | text      = address the issue of homelessness, all they did is create a fictional narrative that was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:20.340
    | text      = exploited by a myriad different forces to push their own agendas.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:25.140
    | text      = People who wanted to attack Obama could use this story to create the image of modern Hoovervilles.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:29.439
    | text      = People who wanted to attack Bush could say that this horror was all his fault.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:32.880
    | text      = People like Alex could use it to argue that, quote, good, hardworking people were being
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:36.180
    | text      = forced into camps.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:37.840
    | text      = None of this reflected reality.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:39.560
    | text      = Schwarzenegger wasn't even behind the plan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:41.399
    | text      = He just approved of it because he was the governor of California.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:45.119
    | text      = It was Mayor Kevin Johnson who was the one who was making the plans, including setting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:49.500
    | text      = up a homelessness task force and having meetings, which included input from people like
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:55.100
    | text      = John Kranitz.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:56.640
    | text      = The plan was not to shut down the tent city and move them into a fairground FEMA camp.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:00.899
    | text      = There was also an $880,000 package that was approved to add beds to existing homeless
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:06.199
    | text      = shelters and create additional shelters, plus offering retail apartments for approximately
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:11.199
    | text      = 40 additional people who are suffering with homelessness.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:14.680
    | text      = So what we have here is a situation where, unfortunately, the interesting element here
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:22.720
    | text      = is that the origin of this propaganda narrative isn't Alex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:25.399
    | text      = It's Oprah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:26.399
    | text      = Alex is certainly putting his own dishonest spin on it, but the underlying narrative that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:30.279
    | text      = he's putting forth that this tent city is full of recession refugees comes directly
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:34.479
    | text      = from Oprah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:35.479
    | text      = Now, the bigger piece of this puzzle, this one that we need to address, is that part
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:39.539
    | text      = and parcel of how the media was representing the story is that these were white homeless
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:43.560
    | text      = people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:44.560
    | text      = Of all the slideshows of pictures I can find, the images on all the articles about this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:48.399
    | text      = tent city, everything, all of the people featured are white.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:51.880
    | text      = See, it's even happening to us.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:54.560
    | text      = There's literally no way I would believe that this isn't subconsciously or consciously what
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:58.520
    | text      = Alex is responding to and why he's covering the story the way he does.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:02.119
    | text      = Absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:03.119
    | text      = That dichotomy that he's creating about these people and other bad people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:06.439
    | text      = This guy with the Winnebago and what it would have been if he was an illegal immigrant.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:09.859
    | text      = All of it is because subconsciously, I believe it's consciously on his part, but what he's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:14.699
    | text      = trying to do is subconsciously reinforce that suggestion to his audience that these are
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:20.020
    | text      = the whites and now they're being attacked.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:24.239
    | text      = It's all white identity shit that's playing out through this tent city narrative.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:29.079
    | text      = The bigger picture of it is something that, yeah, absolutely, we should be talking about,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:32.880
    | text      = but Kevin Johnson, the mayor, and Schwarzenegger aren't trying to force them into a camp.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:37.600
    | text      = They were making good progress.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:40.119
    | text      = The lady who runs Loaves and Fishes even said that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:43.699
    | text      = This is very positive, but unfortunately, no one's going to be paying attention to this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:48.560
    | text      = six months from now, so hopefully we can get... It's like putting a Band-Aid on a bigger
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:52.960
    | text      = wound kind of metaphor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:54.920
    | text      = Hopefully this progress will continue to greater progress.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:58.359
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:59.359
    | text      = I hate Alex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:00.359
    | text      = It reinforces the argument that we've made about the difference between Obama's tyranny
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:04.699
    | text      = and Trump's tyranny being in... Look, Obama is going to do to us what we've done to them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:13.159
    | text      = That's his white narrative with all of these tent cities.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:15.880
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:16.880
    | text      = Chickens coming home to roost.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:17.880
    | text      = Obama's actually doing this to whites.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:20.520
    | text      = He knows with Trump it's just going to be like, eh, we'll bring the whites out of there,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:24.039
    | text      = throw more black people in there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:25.039
    | text      = I think the way around that, because that implies agency on Obama's part, and Alex might
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:29.640
    | text      = not want to even go that far, just because it's easier to debunk.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:35.880
    | text      = I think his rhetoric would be more along the lines of Obama is allowing this to happen
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:39.960
    | text      = to whites.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:40.960
    | text      = The things that he does allows this to happen to whites, whereas with Trump, he has pretty
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:47.819
    | text      = good confidence that he's going to protect the white people over all others.
}}
